activity.title: Drag and drop multiple
activity.instructions: Drag the correct word into each sentence.

audio.oae-label: audio file name (optional). Please include the file extension (.mp3)

question.text: Do you need a new shirt? Yes, I <blank word="do"/>.

audio.oae-label: audio file name (optional). Please include the file extension (.mp3)

question.text: Does Carla like this dress? No, she <blank word="doesn’t"/>.

audio.oae-label: audio file name (optional). Please include the file extension (.mp3)

question.text: Do they want those jackets? No, they <blank word="don’t"/>.

audio.oae-label: audio file name (optional). Please include the file extension (.mp3)

question.text: My sister <blank word="likes"/> this sweater. Me too.

audio.oae-label: audio file name (optional). Please include the file extension (.mp3)

question.text: Who <blank word="needs"/> a new suit? My brother does.

audio.oae-label: audio file name (optional). Please include the file extension (.mp3)

question.text: <blank word="Which"/> pants do you like? The blue pants.
